name: Zelara for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Zelara is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Antwerp, Belgium, Zelara is very emotional and creative girl. She loves to express herself in extravagant hair colors and tattoo on her body. Except her work, the most of all she loves cooking and has a lot of funny stories which happened with her on the kitchen.

So one time Zelara was home alone and it was around dinnertime when she decided to make herself something to eat. She opened the freezer and dug around until she found what appeared to be chicken nuggets in an unopened plastic bag that for some reason, didn’t have any cooking instructions. Thinking that her parents must have thrown away the box for box tops, Zelara called her mom to ask how long and at what temperature to cook chicken nuggets. Mother told her both of them, Zelara laid out about 20 on a tray and stuck it in the oven, setting the timer before she walked out of the kitchen. When it was almost time to get her chicken nuggets, Zelara walked into a cinnamon scented kitchen. She searched all over that kitchen, trying to find the cinnamon scent, leading her to the oven. She decide to turn on the oven light to see if maybe her mom had stuck some cookies in the oven and forgot to bake them, but instead, Zelara find that the tray her chicken nuggets were on has cookies on it instead! As she's trying to process what just happened, she hear the front door open and her mom shout delightedly, “Ooooo what’s that smell?” Mom walks into the kitchen and catches Zelara's confused expression. That’s when the spark ignited and she realized exactly what had happened. Somehow in some form, Zelara had accidentally baked snicker doodles. Since that time Zelara loves to make experiments on the kitchen, as you will never know what it would be until you finish cooking. Also she loves experimenting in the bedroom.

Help Zelara to take her place on the street!

short_description: Zelara is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
